## PublishItemsRequest.deployAt property

Date and time when the content should be deployed at the content delivery side. Should be specified in UTC format. The value will be converted to UTC time if specified with time zone shift, e.g. "2020-01-24T17:24:50+02:00" will be converted to "2020-01-24T15:24:50Z" Conversion is not happening if time zone shift is not specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deployAt?: string;
```
